name: Bulk Edit YOAST SEO fields in Spreadsheet
author: WP Sheet Editor

sections.description:
Edit YOAST SEO title, description, keyword, index status, and see SEO score when you are bulk editing Posts, Pages, and WooCommerce products using the spreadsheet.

This plugin is perfect for you when:

  1. You need to Optimize Your Site SEO.
  2. You want to edit SEO title, description, and keywords quickly

Installation steps

  1. You need to install the free “wp sheet editor” plugin to be able to use this plugin
  2. YOAST SEO plugin must be active
  3. Done. Now you will see the SEO columns on the spreadsheet automatically.

What is WP Sheet Editor

WP Sheet Editor is a free plugin that allows you to bulk edit WordPress posts, pages, and WooCommerce products using a spreadsheet.

Download “wp sheet editor” plugin
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type WP Sheet Editor and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.changelog:
• v1.1.8 – 2024-02-23 –
  • CHANGE – Indicate compatibility with WP 6.4.3

  • CHANGE – Add compatibility with Yoast v22

  • v1.1.7 – 2020-09-15 –

  • CHANGE – Indicate compatibility with WP 5.5

  • v1.1.6 – 2020-02-18 –

  • CHANGE – Add welcome page with instructions

  • v1.1.5 – 2020-01-13 –

  • CHANGE – Don’t auto deactivate the plugin when a premium module exists

  • v1.1.4 – 2019-11-27 –

  • FIX – Make it work with YOAST PREMIUM

  • v1.1.3 – 2019-07-01 –

  • Allow to edit SEO title, description, and keyword for WooCommerce products

See full changelog.
